  • Classes in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.service used by org.eclipse.smarthome.core.items 
    Class and Description
    CommandDescriptionService
    An implementation of this service provides locale specific CommandDescriptions for the given item.
    StateDescriptionService
    Implementations of this service provide strategies for merging info from different StateDescriptionProviders into one StateDescription.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.service used by org.eclipse.smarthome.core.service 
    Class and Description
    AbstractWatchService
    Base class for OSGI services that access to file system by Java WatchService.
    ReadyMarker
    This is a token, identifying something to be completed.
    ReadyMarkerFilter
    Filter for ReadyMarkers which a ReadyTracker is interested in.
    ReadyService.ReadyTracker
    Tracker for changes related to ReadyMarker registrations.
    WatchQueueReader
    Base class for watch queue readers
